mapper.update: update bu_member_address addr set addr.is_primary = 'N' where addr.member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update bu_member_address addr set addr.is_primary = 'Y' where addr.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select addr.id, addr.phone, addr.recipient, addr.address, addr.is_primary, addr.province, province.AREA_NAME as provinceName, addr.city, city.AREA_NAME as cityName, addr.county, county.AREA_NAME as countyName from bu_member_address addr left join bu_p_area province on province.AREA_ID = addr.province left join bu_p_area city on city.AREA_ID = addr.city left join bu_p_area county on county.AREA_ID = addr.county where addr.del_flag = '0' and addr.member_id = #{memberId} order by addr.is_primary desc,id desc limit #{currentPage} , #{pageSize}

select count(*) from bu_member_address addr left join bu_p_area province on province.AREA_ID = addr.province left join bu_p_area city on city.AREA_ID = addr.city left join bu_p_area county on county.AREA_ID = addr.county where addr.del_flag = '0' and addr.member_id = #{memberId}

select addr.id, addr.phone, addr.recipient, addr.address, addr.is_primary, addr.province, FUN_GET_ADDRESS_NAME(addr.id) as fullAddressName from bu_member_address addr left join bu_p_area province on province.AREA_ID = addr.province left join bu_p_area city on city.AREA_ID = addr.city left join bu_p_area county on county.AREA_ID = addr.county where addr.del_flag = '0' and addr.member_id = #{memberId} and addr.id = #{addressId} limit 1
